result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Clever D Escobar

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Clever D Escobar in court with attorney Cameron Weitzner.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The charges are dismissed and read into 16CM417.  Calendar call scheduled for August 26, 2016 at 11:00 am.
State's Demand for Discovery and Inspection and Notice of Intent to Use Defendant's Statement and DNA Evidence. With attached witness list.
Jury trial - 12 person on August 9, 2016 at 08:15 am.
Jury status hearing on August 4, 2016 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court with attorney Cameron Weitzner.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Weitzner advises the Court the parties have reached an agreement but needs additional time to review the Case with the Defendant.   The Court sets the matter for trial.  Jury status hearing scheduled for August 4, 2016 at 09:30 am.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for August 9, 2016 at 08:15 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 17, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court with attorney Cameron Weitzner.  Kristie Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Weitzner requests the Court set the matter for plea and sentencing in about 3 weeks to allow for additional negotiations with the State.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 17, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 27, 2016 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court with attorney Cameron Weitzner.  Kristi J Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Attorney Weitzner advises the Court he is still in negotiations with the State and requests additional time.  The Court sets the matter for plea and sentencing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 27, 2016 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court, in custody, with attorney Cameron Weitzner.   Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   The Attorney advises the Court that he has received discovery and an offer.  The Attorney to advise the Court how the case will proceed at the next hearing.  Hearing scheduled for April 15, 2016 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court, in custody.  Kevin Michael Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The Defendant advises the Court he has been interviewed by the public defender's office at the jail and an attorney will be appointed. Hearing scheduled for March 14, 2016 at 10:30 am.
Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.   Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court.  Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court advises of right to an attorney.  Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation.   NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for February 29, 2016 at 08:30 am.
